summary: Build a prototype for "MythOS Elite"—a cognitive infrastructure system for high-level founders—featuring a Founder Cognitive Blueprint, an AI Founder Twin, a Narrative Dominance Engine, and a Strategic Decision Simulator.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal wordmark logo on transparent background (mythos-elite-wordmark.dim_1200x300.png)
- Abstract premium dashboard hero illustration with neutral tones and subtle gold accent (mythos-elite-hero.dim_1600x900.png)
- Set of 4 monochrome module icons (blueprint, twin, narrative, simulator) (mythos-elite-module-icons.dim_512x512.png)

existing_features.title: Create a clickable prototype UI for “MythOS Elite™” with a simple app shell (header + left navigation) and 4 primary sections: Founder Cognitive Blueprint, AI Founder Twin, Narrative Dominance Engine, and Strategic Decision Simulator.

Implement a coherent, premium visual theme suitable for an elite founder product (distinct typography, neutral palette, strong contrast, restrained accents) and apply it consistently across navigation, cards, forms, and outputs (avoid blue/purple as primary accents).

Founder Cognitive Blueprint module: build a guided multi-step intake that captures the founder traits listed by the user (strategic heuristics, risk tolerance model, moral decision thresholds, crisis response patterns, shadow traits, long-term worldview, competitive instinct structure, communication cadence). Save progress and generate a “Founder Doctrine Manual” as a structured long-form text output.

AI Founder Twin module: provide an artifact ingestion UI for text inputs and file uploads (stored as text content where feasible) for founder interviews, past emails, strategic memos, and public statements. Provide a “Draft” workspace that generates a founder-style response to a prompt using deterministic, local heuristics (no external LLM/API).

Narrative Dominance Engine module: implement structured workflows to produce outputs for (1) public identity positioning, (2) strategic controversy arcs, (3) media angles, (4) long-term cultural narrative placement, and (5) adversary positioning strategy. Allow selecting a target audience and constraints, then generate a narrative “playbook” document.

Strategic Decision Simulator module: implement scenario setup for major founder decisions (launch product, acquire competitor, fire executive, enter new political space) with inputs for assumptions (market, behavioral, historical reaction patterns as user-entered parameters). Compute and display a probabilistic outcome summary using a transparent scoring model and show 2–5 scenario branches with rationale.
Frontend data layer: integrate React Query for loading/mutating the backend entities for each module, including loading states, empty states, and error states.

Add an in-app “Demo Data” action that seeds the prototype with one example Blueprint + Doctrine Manual, a small set of artifacts, one Narrative playbook, and two Simulator runs so the user can explore the experience instantly.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create a clickable/code prototype for MythOS Elite that the user can view (MVP demo).
Implement Founder Cognitive Blueprint module: guided extraction of founder heuristics/traits and generate a Founder Doctrine Manual output.
Implement AI Founder Twin module: ingest founder artifacts (interviews/emails/memos/public statements) to simulate calibrated founder-style decisioning and drafting.
Implement Narrative Dominance Engine module: tools/workflows for public identity positioning, controversy arcs, media angles, and adversary positioning strategy.
Implement Strategic Decision Simulator module: probabilistic scenario modeling for major founder decisions using market/behavioral/historical inputs.

Backend (single Motoko actor): add stable persistence for the prototype entities needed by all modules (Blueprint drafts + manuals, Artifact library, Twin drafts, Narrative playbooks, Simulator runs) with CRUD methods callable from the frontend.
